item.title: Need Help Making Admin Portal
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:1, topic:262332”]case 2472: if(playerRights >= 1) { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; sendMessage("MESSAGE"); } else { sendMessage("MESSAGE"); } break;
Sorry, it just looked too messy for me, so I had to clean it up. :P[/quote]
That’s wrong, this forum abides to use coding conventions.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Making Admin Portal
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

You need to put

case 2472: // modportal if(playerRights >= 1) { teleportToX = ****; teleportToY = ****; sendMessage("You teleport to mod area."); } else { sendMessage("You dont have the right to enter."); } break;
Under first click object method.

item.title: Need Help Making Admin Portal
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

you should search for case (a portal id that works): dont use the brackets then add this one line under that case:

case 2472: // modportal
if(playerRights >= 1) {
teleportToX = ****;
teleportToY = ****;
sendMessage(“You teleport to mod area.”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You dont have the right to enter.”);
}
break;

Read full topic
